    • getQuestionIDs

      public String getQuestionIDs(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Question> examQuestionList)
      Get the question IDs from the exam question list
      Parameters:
      examQuestionList - list of questions in the exam
      Returns:
      a string of question IDs concatenated by "|"

    • validInputs

      public boolean validInputs(String examName, String examTime, String courseID, String publishStatus, String questionIDs)
      Check if the inputs for adding or updating an exam are valid
      Parameters:
      examName - the name of the exam
      examTime - the time limit of the exam
      courseID - the course ID of the exam
      publishStatus - the publish status of the exam
      questionIDs - the question IDs of the exam
      Returns:
      true if all inputs are valid, false otherwise
